issue.title: [Rust] Investigate enabling features in regex crate to reduce compile times
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6482](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6482). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The regex crate recently added a feature flag to reduce compile times and binary size if certain unicode related features are not needed.  We should investigate using this feature.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6482?focusedCommentId=16931347) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~paddyhoran]` may we postpone this after 0.15?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6482?focusedCommentId=16931978) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Yep, will change.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6482?focusedCommentId=17120956) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
`[~paddyhoran]` I've briefly looked at this, and it seems like the only feature we'd want to remove would be Unicode support (<https://docs.rs/regex/1.3.9/regex/#crate-features>).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6482?focusedCommentId=17121073) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Yep, it's the unicode features I had in mind.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6482?focusedCommentId=17332035) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/51
